pages.text: The genuine Orotiagito.$(br2)Legendary Blade from an extraordinary smith, has gathering great fame among the swordsman.$(br2)Find it from the Hydra's tail.
Find the Hydra in the Twilight Forest, then slay it.
The Orotiagito has the so-called Power of the Stars, which is the same as the Sange.$(br2)Before its rust is finally removed, you can hardly reveal its mystery.
